{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [785, 623],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true

      "position": [18, 10],
      "bounds": [749, 144]
    },

      "position": [14, 314],
      "bounds": [757, 152],
      "contentsVisible": false
    },
    {
      "name": "LayoutImage IMG class='visible composited box'",
      "position": [24, 24],
      "bounds": [100, 100]
    }
  ]
}
